amendment.description: Senate amendments insert a complete new text entitled "Hizballah International Financing Prevention Act of 2015" and appears on page H9341 of the December 16, 2015 Congressional Record.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 114-341 to require the FOMC to make public the full transcriptions of their meetings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: King (IA) amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. Modification adds the provisions of the amendment No. 4 printed in House Report 114-341.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. King (IA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
